product_name: Electric EG2.5 Snow Goggles - Eclipse Frame
long_description: Offering a great fit for small- to medium-sized faces, the Electric EG2.5 Eclipse snow goggles deliver a wide field of vision thanks to a minimalist frame and large spherical lens. Comes with a Bronze/Gold Chrome lens with a bronze tint, 14-22% visible light transmission (VLT) and mirror finish for great definition in sunny to partly cloudy conditions. Scratch-resistant spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Double-layer lens helps create a thermal barrier to reduce fogging; directional pressure valve allows lens to adapt to altitude changes without distorting the lens. Antiglare coating on inside of lens and light-absorbent paint on frame panels below eyes work to minimize the effects of glare and reflected light, reducing eye strain. Antifog lens treatment and full-perimeter venting combat lens fogging, delivering clear vision in changing weather. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Tough, minimalist thermoplastic urethane frame offers consistent flexibility in changing temperatures for a comfortable, secure fit. The helmet-compatible design of the Electric EG2.5 snow goggles fits small- to medium-size faces; goggles come with a microfiber storage bag.
